title: 24/7 Support.
desc: We've got you covered. Cherry Theme comes with 24/7 free support wich makes sure you wont stay alone with your questions.

title: Detailed Documentation
desc: We provide detailed documentation helping to install and manage Cherry Theme with ease.

title: Power Page Builder
desc: Human friendly backend page composer makes it really easy to create versatile page layouts with no coding required.

title: Responsive Grid and FlexBox
desc: We used the latest Bootstrap4 grid with flexbox features to make sure your site looks same great at any device and resolution.

title: WordPress Live Customizer
desc: Make changes to your website and see instant changes with live customizer tool.

title: GPL 3
desc: Feel the freedom of GNU GPL license, the theme does not limit the number of your personal and commercial projects built with it.

title: Accent on Functionality
desc: We've integrated Cherry Theme with cool free plugins that help to create full functional business website.

title: Live Customizer
desc: Customizer options allow to change your website dramatically, make changes and see them taking effect right away!
